com.codename1.rad.controllers

Class ControllerEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.events.ActionEvent
      • com.codename1.rad.controllers.ControllerEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionNode.ActionNodeEvent, ApplicationController.ApplicationEvent, AppSectionController.ExitSectionEvent, CollapsibleSideBarContainer.SideBarEvent, FormController.FormControllerEvent, ViewController.DidSetViewEvent, ViewController.DidUnSetViewEvent

    public class ControllerEvent
extends ActionEvent

    A base event for all controller events. This is the fundamental building block for how information propagates up the controller hierarchy from views or child-controllers.
